inclusion.criterion: first-line surgery via trans-sphenoidal route by microscopic and/or endoscopic approach
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: available follow-up after 60 months of treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: s.c. octreotide for longer than 15 days
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of acromegaly due to pituitary adenoma and underwent transsphenoidal surgery. He takes vitamin D and multivitamins post-surgery.
